passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(3) > div > div > div > article > h1:nth-child(5)
html > body > div:nth-child(3) > div > div > div > article > div:nth-child(6) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(3) > div > div > div > article > div:nth-child(6) > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(4) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > h3:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(4) > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > h3:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(4) > div > div > div:nth-child(3) > div > h3:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(4) > div > div > div:nth-child(4) > div > h3:nth-child(1)
